name: Snooze (Nic Magnier)
description:
Snooze is a time limited arena shooter (inspired inspired by Geometry Wars) where you can shoot the timer to gain more time and delay the inevitable.

The game was made for the Ludum Dare 50, with the theme "delay the inevitable" as a Compo Entry (Solo in 48 Hours)

Controls:

  • Arrow keys and wasd to move the ship
  • Mouse to aim
  • Hold Mouse button to shoot

Bugs:

  • When you start a new game, there might be an unexpected difficulty spike at the beginning.

Tools and software:

  • Engine: Godot
  • Sound Effect: Chiptone
  • Music: Garage Band
  • Font: Noyh
